sn36.5:1: "Tisso imā, bhikkhave, vedanā. Katamā tisso? Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā. Sukhā, bhikkhave, vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā, dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā.
sn36.5:2: Yo sukhaṁ dukkhato adda,dukkhamaddakkhi sallato;Adukkhamasukhaṁ santaṁ,addakkhi naṁ aniccato.
sn36.5:3: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu,parijānāti vedanā;So vedanā pariññāya,diṭṭhe dhamme anāsavo;Kāyassa bhedā dhammaṭṭho,saṅkhyaṁ nopeti vedagū"ti.
